title: 服务器显示java hotspot(tm) client vm warning: 无法开启
txt_content:
java hotspot(tm) client vm warning: using incremental cms is deprecated and will likely be removed in a future release 
error occurred during initialization of vm could not reserve enough for 2097152KB object heap

replies.txt_content:
jiuerd 发表于 2014-7-8 22:01
内存不足？
把-xmx2G改成-xmx1024M
然后，，，
